analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0x9e1bdd783015bcbcafe6c86c39f46f9142ddda93.sol:
	Contract CryptoqrpayToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0x9e1bdd783015bcbcafe6c86c39f46f9142ddda93.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/12/0x9e1bdd783015bcbcafe6c86c39f46f9142ddda93.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
